resources.string:
Hii, My Name is Sahil Mane, 

 I am more of a Software Developer who can work in any language desired by the client. 
 I am Mostly skilled in Javascript but also knows how to code in Java and python. 
 The framework that I like in Python is Django to build full stack web applications. 
 In Javascript, I work mostly in Service Oriented Architecture where I separate the frontend and backend. 
 For frontend, I am skilled in React, and In Backend, I am skilled in Express, Hono and Fastify and if it comes to Monolithic then NextJs. 
 I am familiar with wide range of databases like MySQL, PostgreSQL, Microsoft SQL Server, MongoDB, Firebase, appwriteDB and Redis.
